com.github.triceo.robozonky

Class ApiProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.triceo.robozonky.ApiProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable

    public class ApiProvider
extends Object
implements AutoCloseable
    Provides instances of Zonky and Zotify API for the rest of RoboZonky to use. When no longer needed, the ApiProvider needs to be close()ed in order to not leak WebServiceClients.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ApiProvider()
      Create a new instance of the API provider that will use a fresh instance of ResteasyClientBuilder.
      ApiProvider(org.jboss.resteasy.client.jaxrs.ResteasyClientBuilder clientBuilder)
      Create a new instance of the API provider that will use a given instance of ResteasyClientBuilder.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ZonkyApi authenticated(ZonkyApiToken token)
      Retrieve user-specific Zonky API which requires authentication.
      ZotifyApi cache()
      Retrieve Zotify's marketplace cache.
      void close() 
      ZonkyOAuthApi oauth()
      Retrieve Zonky's OAuth endpoint.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ApiProvider

        public ApiProvider(org.jboss.resteasy.client.jaxrs.ResteasyClientBuilder clientBuilder)
        Create a new instance of the API provider that will use a given instance of ResteasyClientBuilder. It is the responsibility of the caller to make sure that the builder and all clients are thread-safe and can process parallel HTTP requests.
        Parameters:
        clientBuilder - Client builder to use to instantiate all the APIs.

      • ApiProvider

        public ApiProvider()
        Create a new instance of the API provider that will use a fresh instance of ResteasyClientBuilder. This client will be thread-safe.

    • Method Detail

      • cache

        public ZotifyApi cache()
        Retrieve Zotify's marketplace cache.
        Returns:
        New API instance.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If close() already called.

      • oauth

        public ZonkyOAuthApi oauth()
        Retrieve Zonky's OAuth endpoint.
        Returns:
        New API instance.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If close() already called.

      • authenticated

        public ZonkyApi authenticated(ZonkyApiToken token)
        Retrieve user-specific Zonky API which requires authentication.
        Parameters:
        token - The Zonky API token, representing an authenticated user.
        Returns:
        New API instance.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If close() already called.

      • close

        public void close()
        Specified by:
